resources.string: \nYou\'re now connected to Microsoft Graph. Tap the button below to send a message from your account using the Microsoft Graph API.\n
\nCheck your inbox. You have a new message :)
\nSorry, can\'t connect to Microsoft Graph.\nHint: Check logcat for details.
\nSorry, can\'t send the email.\nHint: Check logcat for details.
Error connecting to Microsoft Graph\nCheck logcat for details
Error sending email\nCheck logcat for details
The client ID or redirect URI is not valid. Enter a valid client ID and redirect URI in the Constants.java file and run again
Welcome to Microsoft Graph development on Android with the Connect sample

Congratulations!

This is a message from the Microsoft Graph Connect Sample. You are well on your way to incorporating Microsoft Graph endpoints in your apps.

See the photo you just uploaded!

What\'s next?

  • Check out developer.microsoft.com/graph to start building Microsoft Graph apps today with all the latest tools, templates, and guidance to get started quickly.
  • Use the Graph Explorer to explore the rest of the APIs and start your testing.
  • Browse other samples on GitHub to see more of the APIs in action.

Give us feedback

If you have any trouble running this sample, please log an issue on our repository.

For general questions about the Microsoft Graph API, post to Stack Overflow. Make sure that your questions or comments are tagged with [microsoftgraph].

Thanks, and happy coding!
    Your Microsoft Graph samples development team

See on GitHub Suggest on UserVoice Share on Twitter
